question: 雰囲気
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>surround</kanji>ing <kanji>energy</kanji> in the <kanji>atmosphere</kanji> is what makes up the <vocabulary>atmosphere</vocabulary>. I love it when it takes three kanji to represent what one of the three kanji already represents.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
